root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 10-c-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 10. Reduce inequalities within and across countries10.c By 2030, reduce the transaction costs of migrant remittances to below 3 percent and eliminate channels of remittances costing more than 5 percent10.c.1 Costs of remittances in proportion to the amount transferredThe amount deducted from the transfers made, set by the BRB according to the amount transferred,Ratio between the sum of all the amounts received following the money transfers made to the total of the transfersNot available
